nodes.text: Brainee was a male Siniteen associate of the Rodian bounty hunter Greedo during the Clone Wars.

Around 21 BBY, the Pantoran Chairman, Baron Notluwiski Papanoida and his son Ion came to Jabba's Palace looking for Greedo, whom they suspected of kidnapping the chairman's daughters, Chi Eekway and Che Amanwe. Brainee and a Weequay were playing a game of chance cubes with Greedo, when they were informed by Trella Bare'Ah, Greedo's Twi'lek girlfriend, about Papanoida's inquiries.

Following Greedo, Brainee and the Weequay attempted to capture Papanoida and Ion, but the Baron turned the tables on them an in turn captured Greedo, holding him at Vibroblade-point. Papanoida brought the group before Jabba the Hutt and presented evidence which forced Greedo to confess to his part in the kidnapping.
During production of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, another Siniteen—later identified as Pons Limbic—was referred to as "Brainee".
Brainee was voiced by David Acord in Clone Wars.
